import React from 'react' const NomenclatureCard = ({ title, desc, countType, typeCostFirst, typeCostSecond, costFirst, costSecond, image}) => { return (
Наименование

{desc}
Ед. Изм.

{typeCostFirst}
{costFirst} руб.
{typeCostSecond}
{costSecond} руб.
{/* */}

{desc}
{countType}
{costFirst} руб.

{/* */}
) } export default NomenclatureCard
